meta.title: MamaCare Daily Nutrition (40 weeks × 7 days)
notes: This plan provides food-based suggestions only. It does not prescribe medicines or supplements.
Always adapt to allergies, intolerances, cultural foods, and clinician advice.
Fish choices are low‑mercury; avoid high‑mercury species.

weeks.theme: First trimester: nausea-friendly, fibre, iron + vitamin C, hydration; avoid unpasteurised foods & high‑mercury fish.

days.headline: Iron‑rich foods paired with vitamin C
Pasteurised dairy or fortified alternatives for calcium
